name: Virus Vaccine
description:
A fast platformer game where you have to get the Corona Virus Vaccine. You have to do each level quick because the is lava rising. There will also be some corona balls that you have to dodge.

        'NOTE'

When launching the game on Windows and macOS, you might get a notice about security. Choose to run the game anyway. On macOS, you may need to open Security and Privacy tab in System Preferences.
